# MAS GitHub Repository Structure

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration for MAS marketplace.

## Contents

- `workflows/` - GitHub Actions for CI/CD
- `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` - Issue templates for contributors
- `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/` - PR templates

## Workflows

- `validate-skill.yml` - Validates new skill submissions
- `release.yml` - Automated releases
- `security-scan.yml` - Security checks
